application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 6 (sustainable drainage scheme) of planning permission reference 63099/APP/2023/1608, dated 10-04-2024, for the 'The demolition of existing structures and redevelopment for Use Classes E(g)(iii), B2 and B8 (applied flexibly) including hard and soft landscaping, servicing and associated works'.
site_name: LAND AT AINSCOUGH CRANES, UNIT 84, HAYES INDUSTRIAL PARK
decision_conditions: The Applicant has failed to provide evidence (photographs and installation contracts) to demonstrate that the sustainable drainage scheme for the site has been completed in accordance with the previously submitted full application details and necessary to prevent the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with Policies SI 12 and SI 13 of The London Plan (2021), its associated Sustainable Design and Construction SPG, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems, and Policy EM6 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1: Strategic Policies.
